Name: Shimron Hetmyer
Bowl: West Indies U19, Guyana Amazon Warriors, West Indies Cricket Board President XI, West Indies A, UWI Vice Chancellors XI, West Indies, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Delhi Capitals, West Indians, Multan Sultans
Teams: West Indies U19, Guyana Amazon Warriors, West Indies Cricket Board President XI, West Indies A, UWI Vice Chancellors XI, West Indies, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Delhi Capitals, West Indians, Multan Sultans
Bio: had played four games after his first-class debut for Guyana in April 2014 before he led West Indies to their first Under-19 World Cup title,in Bangladesh in 2015-16
